ISSUE.TITLE: The caption of the form for saving table configurations is wrong
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.3-beta1 ### Python Version 3.12 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Open the IP address (or any other) list view 2. Modify the table columns and save 3. Open the dropdown next to the "Configure Table" button and click on "Save" ### Expected Behavior The dialog that opens now has a meaningful caption (or none at all) ### Observed Behavior The dialog always shows the caption "Device"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #19170 from netbox-community/18287-last_sync-column #18287: Add a `last_synced` table column

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19173: Fix heading text on table config form
Fixes #19173: Fix heading text on table config form (#19174)
